name: Mr. Mix (Original Game)
description:
This is just a small game to bring the original Mr Mix "game" to life.

Since I always thought it was a game, but recently finding out that it was "apparently" just a video that looked like a game, I thought about actually using the images to create a small interactive game out of it.

When typing out some of the letters, it may do 2 letters at once because I don't know how to do 1 letter each time for the words on the screen. Most letters are fine but some have a slight glitch but not game breaking.

There isn't anything special about this game, honestly, it's just the original "game" that I saw on YouTube and decided to make it interactive.
